name: n8n-nodes-base.timescaleDb
semantic_context: Add and update data in TimescaleDB

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

query.name: query
query.placeholder: SELECT id, name FROM product WHERE quantity > $1 AND price <= $2
query.description: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions or $1 and $2 in conjunction with query parameters.
query.ai_hint: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions or $1 and $2 in conjunction with query parameters.

schema.name: schema
schema.description: Name of the schema the table belongs to
schema.ai_hint: Name of the schema the table belongs to

table.name: table
table.description: Name of the table in which to update data in
table.ai_hint: Name of the table in which to update data in

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for rows to update
columns.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for rows to update

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Name of the property which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id".
updateKey.ai_hint: Name of the property which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id".

returnFields.name: returnFields
returnFields.description: Comma-separated list of the fields that the operation will return
returnFields.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of the fields that the operation will return

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: mode
Multiple Queries
options.description: Default. Sends multiple queries at once to database.

options.name: Transaction
options.description: Executes all queries in a single transaction
The way queries should be sent to database. Can be used in conjunction with Continue on Fail. See the docs for more examples

options.name: queryParams
options.description: Comma-separated list of properties which should be used as query parameters

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF operation IN ["insert", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'returnFields'
